user-story.as-a: viewer who relies on accessibility features
user-story.so-that: I can fully consume story content regardless of my accessibility needs

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Closed captions support at least English, Spanish, and French tracks with ability to toggle per user session and styling that meets WCAG 2.1 AA contrast requirements.
Transcript panel renders synchronized cues with keyboard navigation (Tab/Shift+Tab, Arrow keys), search filtering, and click-to-seek back into the video.
Screen reader announcements cover playback state changes, section navigation, and transcript selection using localized messaging.
Keyboard shortcuts (Space, Arrow Left/Right, Arrow Up/Down, `C`, `F`) control playback, seeking, volume, captions, and fullscreen as defined in the spec without conflicting with OS reserved keys.
High contrast mode and reduced motion preferences are auto-detected from system settings and applied without requiring a restart.
Accessibility assets (captions/transcripts) are cached offline per story for 24 hours with eviction when storage exceeds 50MB.
Analytics events `story_caption_toggled` and `story_transcript_viewed` emit with required attributes (`storyId`, `language`, `wasEnabled`, `searchTerm`, `userAccessibilityProfile`).
Axe-core CI job (`story_accessibility_checks.yaml`) and widget tests pass with zero violations; manual QA confirms compliance using VoiceOver/TalkBack.

task.description: Implement `prepare_accessibility_assets_use_case.dart` to fetch caption and transcript assets, persisting to secure storage with 24h TTL
Create `accessibility/caption_service.dart` for WebVTT parsing, styling, and language switching
Build `transcript_panel.dart` widget with synchronized cue highlighting, search box, and keyboard nav traps
Enhance `story_video_player.dart` controls for screen reader labels, high contrast themes, and reduced motion toggles
Implement keyboard shortcut handler referencing spec key map, including conflict detection with OS shortcuts
Create `story_accessibility_page.dart` debug surface toggled from developer menu to visualize captions, transcript sync, and focus order
Extend `story_event_sink.dart` to publish `story_caption_toggled` and `story_transcript_viewed` schemas with defined attributes
Configure CI workflow `story_accessibility_checks.yaml` to run axe-core Flutter driver tests nightly
Document VoiceOver/TalkBack manual QA steps in `testing/manual/accessibility-story.md`
